version_description:
Optimizations.

If you like the game and want to support us, please write or update your review on the AppStore! Thank you very much.

Enjoy the game. Take a break, if needed.

Follow 2048 on Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/2048_game
Share score option bug on iPad has been fixed in this update.

Improvements.

◉ By tapping Menu and then swiping to the right, you'll find the Challenges mode!
◉ Play 2048 Multiplayer mode (Coop or Versus) by tapping Menu.

Bug fixes and improvements.

◉ By tapping Menu and then swiping to the right, you'll find the Challenges mode!
◉ Play 2048 Multiplayer mode (Coop or Versus) by tapping Menu.
◉ Play the Challenges mode, you have a limited number of moves to collect specific tiles. Try it now! Go to MENU > CHALLENGES.
◉ Play the Challenges mode, you have a limited number of moves to collect specific tiles. Try it now! Go to MENU > CHALLENGES.
